news.headline: Paramount Extends Warner Bros. Discovery Tender Deadline
news.summary: Paramount extended the deadline on its tender offer for Warner Bros. Discovery to Feb. 20 and urged shareholders on Thursday to reject the latest offer from rival suitor Netflix.  The extension gives Paramount more time to court Warner shareholders with its $77.9 billion offer for the full company.  Warner said earlier this week that it had struck a new, all-cash deal with Netflix for its studios and HBO Max streaming service, valued at $72 billion.

This article first appeared on GuruFocus.

The company said adjusted earnings per share for the first quarter are expected to land between $1.12 and $1.18, compared with the average Wall Street estimate of $1.19. news.headline: Adobe's Digital Media Revenues Gain Traction: What's the Path Ahead?
news.summary: ADBE Digital Media segment continues to anchor the company's growth trajectory. In fiscal 2025, Digital Media revenues reached $17.65 billion, up 11% year over year.
news.article_text:
Adobe’s ADBE Digital Media segment continues to anchor the company’s growth trajectory. In fiscal 2025, Digital Media revenues reached $17.65 billion, up 11% year over year on a reported and a constant currency basis. The segment accounted for 74% of revenues in the fiscal year, while annualized recurring revenue (ARR) totaled $19.20 billion, up 11.5% year over year.

news.article_text: Roper Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROP) is one of the Best Depressed Stocks to Buy Right Now.
